hevs.gdx2d.lib.interfaces

Interface AndroidResolver


  • public interface AndroidResolver
    An interface for Android actions that should be triggered from libgdx side
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Pierre-Andre Mudry (mui), Christopher Metrailler (mei)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LENGTH_LONG 
      static int LENGTH_SHORT 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dismissAboutBox()
      Force to dismiss the about dialog.
      void showAboutBox()
      Display an about dialog Activity.
      void showToast(java.lang.CharSequence text, int duration)
      Show an Android Toast on the screen with default position on the screen (bottom center).

    • Field Detail

      • LENGTH_LONG

        static final int LENGTH_LONG
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LENGTH_SHORT

        static final int LENGTH_SHORT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • showAboutBox

        void showAboutBox()
        Display an about dialog Activity.

      • dismissAboutBox

        void dismissAboutBox()
        Force to dismiss the about dialog. Must be called when the screen orientation change.

      • showToast

        void showToast(java.lang.CharSequence text,
             int duration)
        Show an Android Toast on the screen with default position on the screen (bottom center).
        Parameters:
        text - The text of the Toast
        duration - How long to display the message. Either LENGTH_SHORT or LENGTH_LONG
